issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add ability to log via logger dependency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5950](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5950). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice to be able turn on debug logging at runtime and see how query plans are built and optimized. I propose adding a dependency on the log crate.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5950?focusedCommentId=17253517) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8986
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8986>
